alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:54AM CDT until April 05 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... North central Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 154 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atkins, or 10 miles east of Russellville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Atkins... Pottsville... Damascus... Twin Groves... Bethlehem... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Claude... Cleveland... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Lanty... Whipple... Jerusalem... St. Vincent... Blick... Birdtown... Appleton... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.
